column28: this Chuck Taylor All-Star series from converse are also called Chucks and come in classic designs. Created using canvas and rubber
column29:
this range of sneakers from Converse have a retro feel.

Upper


 





  • Canvas upper for easy maintenance and durability



  • Purple textile lining for greater comfort



  • Carbon rubber toe box for enhanced protection of the upper foot



  • Long canvas tongue for added comfort and snug Fit



  • Purple lace-ups through metallic eyelets for durability and snug fit   




 


Midsole


 





  • Cushioned footbed delivers all day comfort




 


Outsole


 





  • Reinforced guard to protect the forefoot of the shoe and enhance durability



  • Vulcanized rubber outsole with multi-directional pattern for flexibility and traction




 


Shoe care
Make a paste using 1 tbsp of baking soda

1 tbsp white vinegar and 1 tbsp hot water
